AGp.caption: Class to trigger
AGp.doc: The unique name of the class of the antenna element you want to trigger. Cannot contain spaces or weird characters, stick to a simple word or use _ and you'll be safe. For example, if you gave the class name "Slime" to the element "Antenna A" , here you write "Slime" to target it. Keep in mind the antenna must be visible, not by the user, but bubble-visible, I mean, loaded in the page.
AGp.name: class_to_trigger
